The rooms are of a nice size, the staff is helpful, and they serve a great complimentary breakfast as well as a light dinner on the weekdays between 5 and 7 p.m.  I liked the location- it has the appearance of seclusion but within a very short distance is markets, restaurants, etc.  Just a note if you have animal allergies: The beds have down pillows and blankets.  However, if you speak to the desk personnel they will have housekeeping replace them with regular pillows and blankets.   There is access to an exercise room with a television that you can actually hear, a pool, and a fountain area for lounging.  Great place to stay!!
Manager Response: Dear TheTraveling3,  Thank you so much for your glowing review! We're so happy that you decided to stay at our hotel during your trip. We always aim for the best quality of service for all of or guests and we're thrilled that we made such a grand impression with you! We love hearing that you adored our delicious complimentary breakfast, our luxurious guest rooms, and our friendly hospitality! We strive to provide the best hospitality and service and are so happy that we  were able to exceed your expectations.  Once again, we thank you for your recommendation and we hope to see you again!   Sincerely,   Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for weekend event
Summary: We stayed here as part of a room block with a wedding. The hotel was clean, convenient to a grocery store and restaurants (grocery via walking and restaurants via car), and only about half an hour from the beach. The staff were incredibly friendly and accommodating, and the rooms were very large (we had a king bed and sofa couch). The breakfast makes it easy to meet up with a group of people before spending the day exploring the area.
Manager Response: Dear Amy_en_route,   Thank you for your kind remarks and we're so thankful that you selected our hotel for your recent stay! We appreciate your patronage and we're thrilled that you loved our spacious guestrooms, friendly staff, and our world class ambiance. Our hotel always strives to go above and beyond when it comes to providing top tier hospitality for all of our guests and we're pleased that we made such a great impression on you. We thank you once again for your kind recommendation and we hope to see you again in the future!   Best regards,   Dean Birtles  General Manager

Summary: The room was beautifully appointed, with the convenience of a wet bar and small refrigerator. The bed was one of the best I've encountered. Desk personnel were friendly and personable, and enhanced our stay with recommendations for nearby restaurants. Daily housekeeping attention was unobtrusive and welcome. Breakfast was a welcome treat - not over the top, but hot, fresh food with plenty of variety. We will definitely stay here again when we visit this area!

Compared to our last hotel stay in Orange County (hint..... the hotel is two words beginning E.  S.) this was a VAST improvement.  We liked the room, enjoyed the little light dinner on a Tuesday night, thought the front desk personnel were great, even enjoyed the room.  The breakfast was OK, but nothing special.  After breakfast we went back to the room with the intention of loafing for about 2 1/2 hours (since we had until noon to checkout).  But at 10:45, despite the notice "Do Not Disturb" in the door key -- the maid pounded on the door and tried to get into the room to clean it.  That's how you get a star removed, unfortunately.  Other than that it's a nice hotel and we enjoyed it!
Manager Response: Dear bluejay19golf,   Thank you so much for your lovely review and we are so happy that you chose our hotel for your recent trip to Orange County.  In regards to your recent stay, I would like to offer my most sincere apology for the disturbance you experienced with our housekeeping service. Please know that this is not typical of our service and that I have addressed this issue with our housekeeping team to prevent it from reoccurring in the future.  Nevertheless, I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at our hotel. We appreciate your kind words about the service from our front desk personnel, hotel amenities and spacious rooms and hope to see you again on your next trip to Orange County!  Best regards,  Dean Birtles  General Manager

Summary: We booked 4 rooms for a two night stay to attend a family function. We needed one room to be roll in wheelchair accessible. I personally contacted reservations and they did an outstanding job of accommodating our needs and having the rooms situated close together for convenience. The staff took their time to make sure all of the details were to our satisfaction and called me back to confirm with us. Excellent! The check in was quick, courteous and professional. The hot breakfast service was great! The rooms were clean, well appointed and had coffee, microwave, mini fridge, hair dryer, ironing board & iron, plenty of towels and great beds! The lobby had fresh fruit and water out at all times. Every staff member from reservations to breakfast room were professional and pleasant. I
Manager Response: Dear EES00,   Thank you very much for choosing our hotel for your recent trip and we're delighted to hear that your stay was so enjoyable!   We are glad to hear that our world class amenities, attentive staff, and our luxurious guest rooms made your trip extremely comfortable and relaxing.   At our property and Ayres as a whole, we strive to provide the best hospitality and service for all of our guests from near and far to ensure that they have the best stay possible.   Once again, we are very grateful for your thoughtful review and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!   Warm regards,   Dean Birtles  General Manager

Summary Heading: Wish this brand were in the northeast
Summary: I usually stay at this hotel when visiting southern CA.  It is always perfect, from the rooms, to the lobby and staff, and the breakfast and evening light dinner.  The rooms and even the hallways are beautifully appointed.  It is a wonderful place to stay both for short and long stays.
Manager Response: Dear 1954deb,   Thank you so much for your lovely review and we are so happy that you chose our hotel for your recent trip to Southern California!  We are pleased to hear your wonderful remarks about our European boutique inspired decor, our specialty breakfast, as well as the service from our staff.  Providing our guests with the best hospitality and service has always been our mission and we are so delighted to hear that we were able to exceed your expectations.   Once again, thank you so much for your glowing recommendation and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Southern California!   Sincerely,  Dean Birtles  General Manager

Summary: We have stayed at this Ayres Suites location multiple times over many years to visit family in the area. It is always clean and the staff is always friendly and helpful. Even though the hotel was at full capacity over Memorial Day weekend, the breakfast staff worked extra hard to make sure all guests had what they needed. We will return!

I was in Mission Viejo for five days for a seminar and we were housed at the Ayres Suites. The rooms were large and nicely appointed and the staff was friendly and courteous; helpful whenever possible. I think the best part of the stay was the lovely women who handled the breakfast. They were attentive, friendly and very help. I would definitely stay there again if ever in the area.

Summary Heading: Great staff, excellent value, and a hot breakfast!
Summary: I've stayed in this hotel multiple times with my family and have a great experience every time. The staff is wonderful, the rooms are spacious, and the breakfast is enviable. We enjoy staying here whenever we're in town.
Manager Response: Dear kselff,   Thank you so much for your glowing review and we're so happy that you enjoyed staying with us! We are pleased to hear that our friendly staff, spacious rooms, and our scrumptious American breakfast make our hotel so wonderful for you as well as your family. We greatly appreciate your recommendation and hope to see you again!   Sincerely,   Dean Birtles  General Manager

Summary: The hotel was easy to locate based on their directions, a friendly gal ready immediately to check us in, clean & well apportioned room. Staff was welcoming and professional in all encounters. Will return!

I stayed at this hotel, which was near a conference I was attending.  The front desk staff were so helpful and friendly upon arrival and during the check-out process.  The rooms were very clean. The entire property is very well kept!  This was a beautiful setting. I definitely hope to stay here again.

We throughly enjoyed the accommadations. We had a wonderful breafast (sausage, bacon, eggs, hashbrowns, and more) each morning. Water with oranges/limes in the Lobby at all times. room very spacious and clean. Great pool area.
Manager Response: Dear Cheryl M,   Thank you so much for your warmhearted review and we're glad that you decided to stay with us for your trip! We're so thrilled that you enjoyed our spacious guest rooms, our hotel amenities, and especially our scrumptious continental American breakfast. We try to provide the best and most comfortable accommodations for our guests and we aim to give high quality service on a daily basis. Once again, thank you so much for your recommendation and we hope to see you soon!   Sincerely,   Dean Birtles  General Manager

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for a conference I was attending, so location gets great marks for the proximity to the conference location.  We drove over to Laguna Beach one evening, not more than 20 mins away.  The front desk staff were friendly and helpful - in a real people kind of way, not stuffy or hurried. I really appreciated this.  The decor was beautiful (to my taste, especially all of the paintings in the hallways) and the bed was comfy. All around a lovely experience.  Thank you!

middle of the road, average, and pleasant.   There isn't much choice around the area, and this is probably the best in the vicinity..  i would advocate staying here.. staff are friendly, and pro-active in advice, and the rooms are fine.  it's not a wow hotel, simply a standard hotel
Manager Response: Dear Richiev2009,   Thank you for your candid review on our hotel and we're pleased that you picked our location for your stay. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our top class hospitality since out team strives to provide the best service for our guests. In addition, we're pleased that you found our European-inspired guest rooms to be comfortable. Once again, thank you for your review and we hope to see you soon.   Sincerely,   Dean Birtles  General Manager

Summary: Perfectly situated in Mission Viejo this hotel is just minutes from Laguna Beach.  The staff are super friendly and the hotel is modern and clean.  Free Breakfast, Free WiFi and Free Parking are included.

This is our favorite hotel to stay at. It's in a great area. It's warm and inviting the minute you walk into the lobby. The staff makes you feel like family! Lovely accomodations! The rooms are perfect sized, very comfy beds, has a sink outside shower area, plus a separate sink and mirror by bar area with coffee pot, microwave and refrigerator!  Everything you need for a great stay.  The breakfasts are amazing with hot eggs, bacon or sausage, hash browns and various breads/muffins, cold cereals, hot oatmeal, fruit, yogurt, juices, coffee, hot chocolate and teas. Also Mon-Thurs nites they have a great little dinner available if you don't want to eat out. We have had sandwiches, salads, pizza and pasta on the various nights. Also available are snacks, chips/salsa and drinks - beer

Beautiful property on a hill looking at the mountains.  Two properties here - Suites & Hotel. Stayed at the Suites - ate at the Hotel.  Room was nice, large and very quiet.  Nice complimentary breakfast - hot foods not just cold continental.  Happy hour at the Suites was ok.  Restaurant at the hotel was very good and great quiet atmosphere. Food excellent. Staff at both locations were so helpful and nice. Only wish i would have had time to try the spa ! Absolutely would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Sherri B,   Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write your review. We are so happy you had a chance to experience both the hotel and the suite. Our guest service is very important to us, making sure that our guests have the best stay imaginable, and we are glad we made an impression. Greeting our guests in the morning with a good, hearty breakfast is crucial to make sure you start your day off right, so it's fantastic to hear you enjoyed it! We greatly appreciate your recommendation and hope you will have a chance to visit us again very soon.   Sincerely,   Dean Birtles  General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for 1 night only for a wedding in the area. The front desk employee Nicole was very helpful, informative, and accomodating. The rooms were nice and big for my husband & I. The hotel itself seemed very clean and cozy. We didnt get a chance to check out the pool since we were slighted limited on time, but hopefully next time. My girlfriends and I did have our make-up done next door at the other set of rooms that has the spa. That was also a nice treat and once again the hotel accomodated us very well.
Manager Response: Dear Sendit2mcdonald,   We are so happy you chose to stay and prepare for the wedding with us! It is great to hear when we can accommodate such amazing events! We know that cleanliness and coziness is an important part of staying at a hotel and I am glad we made an impression. We greatly appreciate you staying with us for the night and hope that you will have the chance to visit us again very soon to check out the pool.   Sincerely,   Dean Birtles  General Manager

Summary: Just relocated to the area. Stayed in this hotel for 2 weeks with my Wife and Daughter (5 months old) while finding a house. For me, this was both a Business & Family trip.  The hotel is in a decent location, next to the Toll Highway. Easy access to major routes.  Breakfast and Dinner(including Beer & Wine) is Free and available in the Lobby Restaurant. Coin-operated laundry on third floor. Exercise room on second. Outdoor pool and hot tub with a nice view. Rooms are large. First floor rooms on the back side have a small patio with chairs and table. Kitchen is basic. Microwave, small fridge and sink. Bathrooms are nice and very clean. Housekeeping starts early (around 8am) so, if you're planning to sleep in...remember to put that Do Not Disturb sign on the door the night before.

Summary Heading: Excellent choice of hotel for nearby meetings
Summary: I was on a business trip in the area. The hotel location was just between the airport (SNA) and the meeting location. The service was fast and friendly , rooms are big enough with free wi-fi. Breakfast was also included in price.

Summary Heading: Ayers is always the best place to stay
Summary: I travel alot for my business and need a comfortable place to sleep. Ayers always have not only the best beds but a great breakfast as well. Always love my stays at any Ayers hotels. They are courteous, clean and friendly. You wont' be disappointed.

Very helpful staff and every need met. I had alot of requests/extra that i required and I was catered to very well.  Daily shuttle, laundry and food services all hit the mark. Front desk staff Very helpful. Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Ben W,  Thank you very much for the kind words and for taking the time to leave a review on TripAdvisor to let others know about your stay during your business trip. We sincerely appreciate the feedback on our service, it is nice to know that we were able to meet your requests. We are pleased to see that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay and hope to welcome you back another time soon.  Sincerely,  Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary: We enjoyed the facility very much.  We had a queen room which had the couch.  It had all of the equipment mentioned by other reviewers.  The only negative (and not really a negative for young people) is that there is only one entrance (lobby) and when your room is at the far end of the building it is a long walk for older people.  Would we stay there again?  Yes we would, however, would request a room nearer to the lobby on the first or second floor.  Very nice place.  Food was good at the buffet also.

Summary Heading: This Ayers Suites is very nice, a little out of the way
Summary: The location backs up to the 241 toll road and was Not as close as we thought. The rooms are spacious with a coffee maker, small refrigerator and microwave sitting within a bar area with sink.   We had 2 queen beds on the first floor that had a slider with a table and 2 chairs alongside the driveway but overlooking the city. I recommend this side of the hotel as the rooms on the parking lot side are rather dark and only have a window.  They have a decent breakfast with eggs, hash brown potatoes(don't recommend these), sausage,bacon and sometimes ham and pancakes. Great assortment of different breads, yogurt, fruit, oatmeal, juices, coffee and tea are all offered. We did not partake of the Monday thru Thursday dinner reception offered as we were out and about having fun.   you
Manager Response: Dear SLOFoodie398,  Thank you for taking the time to let others know about your experience at our hotel. Your feedback and advice to others is very much appreciated. We are pleased to see that you appreciated the selection offered at the complimentary full American breakfast buffet. It is also nice to see that you enjoyed your accommodations. We hope to see you another time in the near future and thank you again.  Sincerely,  Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary: I was very impressed with this hotel in Mission Viejo. When I pulled up to this hotel it was impressive. The lobby was inviting, well lit, comfortable, and clean.  Pleasant surroundings, spacious, clean rooms, and friendly staff. I would recommend this hotel mainly for couples or business travelers. Not having young children, I wasn't aware of any facilities for the them.
Manager Response: Dear Nicola0331,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a kindly worded review on TripAdvisor to let others know about your recent experience at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate the compliments on the inviting lobby and the comfortable rooms. We are pleased to see that you were impressed with the hotel and our service, it is truly what we strive for. We cannot wait to welcome you another time in the near future, thank you again.  Sincerely,  Dean Birtles  General Manager

Summary: I read nice reviews on this hotel and decided to try. It is really disappointing. It is really noisy. It is like I am with the people in the next room with me. I complained to the lobby about that, they called the neighbor or proposed me to move but, it is the middle of the night and a big part of the problem is the soundproof. Even I change, the problem will be there. The hotel is nice but if you cannot sleep, what's the point ?
Manager Response: Dear Sorya U,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a candid review of your experience at our hotel on TripAdvisor. Our sincerest apologies if you did not experience the highest quality of sleep during your stay. We truly strive to offer the best possible accommodations and are saddened to see we did not succeed in that goal with your stay. We hope you will reconsider giving us another chance to show you how pleasant a stay with us can truly be. Thank you again.  Sincerely,  Dean Birtles  General Manager

Summary: The Ayres in Mission Viejo is superb for families.  Great price, great service, great location, and great breakfast.  I'm not sure how they do it, but everyone from the desk and housekeeping and kitchen staff are terrific, friendly, and outgoing.  I'd move in if I could afford it.

This hotel has a major problem with mildewed rooms that they continue to allow guests to reserve, stay in and (expect them to) pay for.  I had 2 visits that illustrated this continued policy at the Ayres Suites, Mission Viejo, CA location.  I am so unhappy that I will not stay at an Ayres Suites ever again and am advising you as a potential guest to be forewarned!  Check the room BEFORE you accept it and be prepared for Ayres personnel to tell you that is the only available room so you are stuck with it -- MILDEWED -- with nowhere else to stay!  Good Luck!
Manager Response: Dear Gigi H,  Please accept our heartfelt apologies that your stay was anything less than exceptional, we are so very disappointed to see that we did not handle your complaints with a professional manner. The issue will definitely be investigated to prevent further incidents such as this. We do hope you will reconsider staying with us another time in the future so that we may truly prove to you how pleasant a stay at our hotel can be. Again, our sincerest apologies and thank you for taking the time to leave a review on TripAdvisor so that we may use your feedback to improve our hotel.  Sincerely, Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary: Excellent place to stay.  The facility and service is outstanding.  The staff is excellent and very courtesous.  The breakfast offered is outstanding as well and the restaurant is fabulous.  Rates are very good as well....  Thanks
Manager Response: Dear Floyd H,  We are so delighted to see that you enjoyed your recent stay with us and felt inspired to leave a fantastic 5 star review on TripAdvisor. Your kind words about the courteous service are greatly appreciated. Thank you for your compliments on the full American breakfast buffet, we are so pleased to see that you enjoyed it thoroughly. We hope that you will visit another time in the near future and thank you again for your feedback.  Sincerely, Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary: Every thing was wonderful as itis every time we stay at your Hotel. We look forward to our next visit. Thanks for everything. We will also recommend  The Aires to everyone that is llooking for A hotel in your area. Than

You will NOT be disappointed when you stay at the Ayres Mission Viejo!  My husband & I stay almost every week at the Ayres Mission Viejo!  The rooms are ALWAYS clean, comfortable & elegant!  The staff is amazing!  They make you feel that you are their most important guest.  They are all extremely professional in both actions & attire & always treat you with respect & kindness.  They take extreme pride in providing a very warm & comforting atmosphere for all their guests!  We would NOT stay anywhere else & HIGHLY recommend the Ayres Mission Viejo to everyone!  You won't be disappointed!!!!!!  The breakfast is GREAT too!
Manager Response: Dear Patty B.,  Thank you very much for taking the time to let others know about how great your experiences have been at our hotel by leaving a review on TripAdvisor. Your returning visits are greatly appreciated and we are so pleased to know that every week we have the opportunity to welcome you back. It brings us great pleasure to know that you always find your room to be clean, comfortable and elegant. We truly strive to offer the highest quality of service and are so thrilled to see that we succeed in that goal with each of your visits. We truly treasure your loyalty and thank you for recommending our hotel to others, it is greatly appreciated.  Sincerely, Dean Birtles  General Manager

Summary: This is a great hotel for any purpose.  Rooms are nice and well appointed, staff is pleasant and good price.  No complaints.  It is also a good central location, but quiet and close to freeway. We stayed here as part of a wedding party and everyone seemed happy with the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear DeSantis24,  We were so very honored to have you as our guest recently, thank you for leaving a review on TripAdvisor to let others know how pleasant your stay was. We are so pleased to see that you enjoyed the quiet location and found it central to where you needed to be. Thank you for the compliments on our pleasant service, we truly strive to offer the highest quality of service and are so pleased to see that we succeeded in that goal with your stay. We hope to see you another time in the near future and thank you again.  Sincerely, Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary Heading: Stating at the Ayres is like coming home.
Summary: The accomdations are excellent with old world stately beauty.  The apples in a bowl in the morning and the cookies on a tray at night remind me of coming home.  You don't need to eat on at night for the afternoon gatherings are often full meals with lasagne, salad, bread and wine or beer of your choice.  Had the pool and hot tub all evening to ourselves - it doesn't get any better than this.
Manager Response: Dear Mountainlandslady,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a review on TripAdvisor to let others know about your exceptional experience at our hotel. We are so pleased to see that our hotel feels like coming home for you, it is truly what we strive for. Thank you for the compliments on the extra special touches like the fresh fruit and cookies, we are so delighted to see you enjoyed them. Hopefully we will be able to welcome you home another time in the near future, thank you again.  Sincerely, Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary: As usual we totally enjoyed our stay at the Ayres Suites in Mission Viejo.  The staff, as always was wonderful, rooms clean and comfortable, and everything else they offer was right on.  We will be going back again shortly.

Slept here one night for a quick trip near Rancho Santa Margarita.  The Aryes is a little hard to get to when traveling because I did not have a fast pass for my rental car, and it is on the toll-way.  So I had to take the back streets to get to it.  Easy parking, BEAUTIFUL Views of the Saddlebacks and a really nice area (you can walk to a small strip center).  Really good 'free' breakfast and wi-fi included in my price.  I've paid upwards of $15.00 for the same quality breakfast at other places, so I really enjoyed the ability to quickly come in, eat a good breakfast and then move on to my meeting.
Manager Response: Dear Michael A.,  It was an honor to accommodate you on your recent visit to the south Orange County area. Thank you for your compliments on our complimentary full American breakfast and its great value, they are greatly appreciated. We do hope you will consider staying with us again when your travels bring you to the area. Thank you for taking the time to leave a kindly worded review.  Sincerely, Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary: The Ayres Suites was little known to me a few years ago, but have been around a while. This site is amazing. The service is what sets it apart. Anything the staff can do to make you comfortable is just a request away. The beds are almost as comfortable as my Tempur pedic mattress. It is so well located to shopping and freeways. Happy hour Mon-Thursday is really a free meal. This is our fourth quilting retreat there and we have already booked for next year. Wonderful expeirence.
Manager Response: Dear Frantasticquilts,  Thank you so very much for taking the time to let others know about your experience at our hotel by leaving a kind review on TripAdvisor. We are so very pleased to learn that you were impressed with our customer service. We truly strive to offer a friendly hand whenever possible and are so glad to know that we succeeded in that goal with your visit. Thank you for your compliments of the convenient location and complimentary weekday Manager's Reception. It is a great delight to see you enjoyed both! Again, thank you for your fantastic 5 star review and we hope to welcome you another time in the near future.  Sincerely, Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary: Room is large, leather couch and sitting area were a plus.  The happy hour mon-thursday was great, bud light and appetizers for free.  I had breakfast a few times, pretty good. I took it back to my room to enjoy.  The fresh baked cookies at the end of the work day are a treat.  Staff is great, I am staying here for a total of 12 days. So far, all is very good.
Manager Response: Dear Indy2003,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a review on TripAdvisor to let others know about your experience at our hotel. We are so pleased to see that you enjoyed the sofa sitting area in your room. Thank you for the compliments on the Manager's reception and the complimentary full American breakfast buffet, they are greatly appreciated. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we are glad to have been of service. We hope to see you in the near future.  Sincerely, Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful, clean hotel with friendly, efficient staff
Summary: My hotel of choice when returning to Orange County. Great suite arrangement, very clean & beautiful rooms with ceiling fans,  wonderful staff and good value. Location gives choice of taking toll road or regular highways. Spa hotel located next door was very professional and convenient.
Manager Response: Dear lanabowen,  Thank you very much for taking the time to let others know about your experience at our hotel. We are so pleased to see that we are your choice of hotel when visiting the Orange County area. Thank you for your compliments of our accommodations, they are greatly appreciated. It is also nice to know that  you enjoy our service, I will be sure to share this with the team. Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Sincerely, Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary: Stayed here four nights while in town for a wedding.  There is nothing negative we can say about this hotel.  Staff, location, breakfast were excellent!  Really nice that a cook was available for the complimentary breakfast to make eggs to order.  Both cooks while we were there were exceptionally nice and friend.  Would definitely stay here again, as well as refer to our friends and family.

This place had great suites available.  Staff was friendly and fresh evening cookies available.  The best part was the cook on staff in the morning to prepare your made to order breakfast.  Eggs any style along with other options and it was included in the cost of the hotel!

We stay here a couple of times each year and will continue to return anytime we are in Mission Viejo visiting family.  The hotel is always clean, the staff is great, and the cost is extremely reasonable.  Free WiFi is a great benefit.  The included breakfast is a cost saver and the gentleman in charge always remembers me from previous stays and does a great job.  The rooms are large with couch, a refrigerator, microwave and extra sink.   The lobby always has something to drink for its guests, and some great cookies.  We love this hotel, you can't go wrong. We highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear Ken W.,  Thank you for taking the time to recommend our hotel on TripAdvisor, it is truly an honor to welcome you back on various occasions. We are so glad to see that our accommodations and exceptional service keep bringing you back. Thank you for mentioning that our full American breakfast buffet is a great value, we could not agree more! We look forward to welcoming you again soon and thank you for the generously kind review.  Sincerely, Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary: Stayed at this property while visiting the area for a family wedding. Great value; affordable rate included parking, wifi, hot breakfast. Breakfast was good, included eggs, bacon, pancakes etc. Not too much within walking distance, will need a car but most people visiting California rents a car anyway. Room was nice size, clean and comfortable. Good option compared to other properties in this class, would stay here again.

Beautiful room, nice views, very clean.  Bed was very comfortable.   Breakfast was hot and fresh, loved the salsa.  Free wifi. Staff was very nice.  I'd definitely stay there again!  Wish the water bottle in the room wasn't $3.50!  Seriously.   There is a Von's less the a quarter mile from the hotel, you can buy an entire case of water for the same price.  So skip the overpriced hotel water, you aren't trapped in an airplane, you have choices.

Best hotel we have stayed in for a long time.  The bed was great.  The room was very clean. The employees were very helpful and friendly.  And you couldn't beat the wonderful breakfast we had every morning. We would stay there again without a doubt!

Never having stayed at an Ayres Hotel, I had no expectations.  It's snuggled into the Saddleback area - I'd've never noticed it.  The staff was VERY friendly, the room immaculate and the happy hour was like supper!  The morning breakfast was very good and had many choices.  This is a top notch hotel.  You won't be disappointed staying here.
Manager Response: Dear Deborah C.,  Thank you for taking the time to let others know that our hotel is a "Hidden Treasure," it is greatly appreciated! Your thoughtful and kind review has us wishing you weren't so far away in Texas so that you could visit to enjoy the complimentary Manager's Reception and full American breakfast buffet more often! Please do visit again soon and thank you again for recommending our hotel on TripAdvisor.  Sincerely, Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary: My wife and I stayed here recently.  She on business and me, well, a mini vacation.  This is the second time we have stayed here.  The hotel provides spacious and very clean rooms.  The staff is very helpful and have a welcoming attitude.  Beds are comfortable and is a very quite location.  There is a nice pool.  There is free breakfast to start your day off.  I would recommend this hotel if you coming to the area on business or pleasure.
Manager Response: Dear David J.,  Thank you so very much for leaving a review to let others know about your mini vacation at our hotel. It is truly an honor to serve you and thank you for recommending our hotel on TripAdvisor, it is greatly appreciated. We are so proud to see that you thought our service was exceptional and that you enjoyed your clean and spacious hotel room accommodations. Please do come visit soon and enjoy the complimentary full American breakfast again!  Sincerely, Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary: This Ayres was nice and quiet. The rooms were spacious. The Breakfast was hot and plentiful! No powder eggs here! There could have been more seating, because the breakfast was quite popular with the guests!

I was expecting another dull but nice hotel experience when we checked into this Ayers Hotel. It was my first time in this chain. The man at the front desk told us that there was a happy hour with snacks between 5 to 7 pm. My wife checked it out while i was busy working on wifi, and came back with really good tacos and wine.  The next morning was the same experience, great free breakfast, and that night the sandwiches we made were so good we never made it out to dinner, only desert. I was impressed by the quality of the food served gratis.
Manager Response: Dear textileguy,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a review about your experience at our hotel. We are so ecstatic to see that you were pleasantly surprised with the evening Manager's Reception with complimentary beer, wine, and food. We truly strive to impress our guests and it is so fantastic to see that we succeeded in your visit. Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Sincerely, Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary Heading: Eexceptional staff couresy and wonderful service by all at desk and the maids... Wonderful experience with Dean & Tawny
Summary: From the moment we checked in with Dean until the moment we checked out with Tawny our stay was very nice and  the staff was so courteous and kind.. We had a very nice stay with very nice rooms and comfortable beds and areas to lounge. Thanks to all the staff including the maids. We go back every year and we will return again soon. fGary & Kathleen McDonough
Manager Response: Dear Kathleen M.,  Thank you so very much for taking the time to let others know about your experience at our hotel. It is such an honor to welcome you back on multiple occasions. We are so glad to see that you found our service to be courteous and kind and that you thought your hotel room accommodations were spacious and comfortable. We look forward to your next visit when we can welcome you again. Thank you again.  Sincerely, Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary: We enjoyed a family vacation based at the Ayers Suites in Mission Viejo. This hotel is centrally located, and provided a great base for our travels around Southern California from Malibu to San Diego, with many stops in between. The staff is excellent, the property is clean and it is a family friendly property. We'll be back!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel at a great value
Summary: We stayed for a full week while in some business training.  The room was very comfortable, with a sitting area in addition to the queen bed.  Given the length of stay we were inclined to look for a suite hotel with kitchen so we could make our own meals, but the full hot breakfast (not just self-serve pastries here; scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage, home fries every day) and the evening happy hour (sometimes enough that we didn't need anything else for diner) was even better because we didn't have to make it (or shop for ingredients).  And the rate per night was lower than the full-kitchen options.  The staff were very nice, and the front desk lent us a bottle opener, which was nice.
Manager Response: Dear mmcginn87 -  It was a pleasure having you as our guest for a week recently. I am so thrilled to hear that your found your stay comfortable and that our many complimentary amenities added to such a pleasant  experience. We are very appreciative of your recommendation and hope you will visit again very soon.   Warm regards,   Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary: My daughter and I stayed at the Ayres Suites for one night for a friends wedding.  It is a very clean hotel with nice rooms and nice beds.  We didn't have any problems during our stay.  The full service breakfast in the morning was very nice.  I would recommend this hotel.

My Family and I where there for 10 days for a tennis camp, everybody was very nice, the hotel was clean, this was the 3rd year there, would stay again. they have a hot free breakfast and a evening drinks and food on Monday thru Thursday
Manager Response: Dear James -  It was a pleasure having you as our guest recently. Thank you so much for your kind words and for taking the time to share your experience. We loved having the chance to welcome you for 10 days recently and provide you with such comfortable, clean, and inviting accommodations. We hope you will visit again soon.   Thanks again,   Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 10 days for a water polo tournament. This is a great place! The people who work here from the front desk to the restaurant to the cleaning people are all awesome. I don't write many reviews but this hotel warranted it. The place is clean, very well maintained, and our rooms were immaculate every day when we returned. Love the fire pit in the courtyard too.    The only miss here is with breakfast, and its a minor one. I spent a lot of time at breakfast here so figure I would give readers and the hotel my full story. For some reason they offer the same hot food every day. Scrambled eggs from a mix carton, pre-cooked sausage links and pre-cooked potatos. Its not bad, but after 10 days it got a bit old. Granted they have a waffle maker and toaster too,

Cofortable beds, a/c works great.  Very nice, helpful staff.  Stayed at the Ayers suites, which aren't really suites but rather typical hotel rooms.  Very clean, but there was a noticeable funky smell al along the hallway from the elevator to our room.  Carpets may need to be shampooed, walls cleaned thoroughly or maybe some better ventilation circulating through the halls.  Could use a better bar in the restaurant that should be open more hours during the day, especially on the weekends.  Still a great place to stay. Good, free breakfast. CVS right around the corner for any additional needs or forgotten supplies.  Close to Dove Canyon.  Real close to Claim Jumper and surrounding shopping center.
Manager Response: Dear Tim -  Thank you very much for allowing us the opportunity to welcome you and for your kind review. I am so pleased you found each aspect of the hotel, from the complimentary full breakfast to the guestroom bed, so conducive to a pleasant hotel experience. Please note that your comments regarding odor issues have been shared with Housekeeping to ensure it is dealt with immediately. We hope you will visit again soon.   Warm regards,   Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary: Set in the mountains of Mission Viejo. The hotel is 5 stars but at 3 star price. Jeff at the front desk was cheerful and informative. The hotel is decorated beautifully and rooms well appointed. They have a social hour in the evening were the serve different items depending on the day. We had Taco Tuesday with rice and beans. The pantry is open 24 hours a day with complimentary beverages available and the breakfast is a full hot breakfast, including pastries, fruit, and cereal. It was a delicious start to the day. I will definitely stay here again.

Not only were the beds comfortable, but the Ayers Mission Viejo had great staff.  I had left a very important binder in the room after checking out.  In order for my soccer team to play I had to have the binder.  Jeff at the front desk was awesome and could hear the panic in my voice.  He went quickly to the room and found the binder.  When I arrived he had the binder at the front desk waiting for me.  Thanks Jeff

Ayers Suites are becoming my, "go to" Hotels, when visiting the greater LA area.  They are beautifully appointed Hotels with great amenities such as a hot breakfast, large rooms with a living room area and office space.  Beautifully decorated with very comfortable beds with plenty of pillows. The rooms and grounds are all very spotless....

This comfortable hotel is just off the freeway, easy access to local communities. It is clean, well managed, friendly, and had a lovely jacuzzi tub in the room which was a good size. The full buffet breakfast (free) in the morning had eggs, meats, potatoes, salsa, cereals, etc, pretty much everything a hotel breakfast would have, not the very highest quality but decent, and there is also a happy hour light dinner with free wine and beer which I didn't get to try. The gym was simple with a couple of well maintained treadmills and bikes. A couple of restaurants will provide room service. I would certainly go back again.

My wife and I were in Mission Viejo last weekend on some family business and we were delighted with our four night stay at the Ayers Suites Mission Viejo.  Although a little off of the beaten path as far as location, the Ayers more than made up for it with wonderfully appointed large rooms, very comfortable bed, the lobby and all common areas were very tastefully furnished and the morning breakfast was top notch.  Extremely affordable and this hotel had everything that you would find in one at twice the price or more.  The staff was extremely courteous and went out of their way to make you feel special and welcome. Anytime we can find an Ayers Hotel in our travels, we will be booking it.

Stayed at the Ayers Suites over 4th of July week/weekend.  Nice place, clean rooms, convenient to major highways and walking distance to a shopping center/restaurants.  The hotel served a decent breakfast and happy hour was OK, although we didn't partake.  The hotel offers free wi-fi and plenty of TV channels to watch.  My only "gripe" would be that the hotwater was intermittent, meaning that the water temperature would fluxuate between hot/cold, forcing me to have to step out of the shower stream until the water reverted back to my desired temperature.  Other than that, I would return.
Manager Response: Dear homework -  Thank you so much for your review of our hotel and for choosing our hotel for your visit. While I am pleased you found the guestrooms comfortable and amenities an added value, I do apologize for the water temperature issues experienced. Please know I am having my maintenance team look into this immediately as this is a serious comfort issues. We hope this situation has not soured you on us and that we will have the chance to welcome you again.   Sincerely,   Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary: My husband and I have stayed at this hotel several times while visiting with family in Mission Viejo. We choose this great hotel every time because of the nice rooms, comfy beds, awesome hot breakfast with everything you could possibly need, and friendly staff. They also have a little dinner available every evening Mon.-Thurs nights! It may be something like salad and sandwiches, or spaghetti or tacos but we always enjoy it being available. The rooms also have a microwave and frig, sink outside the shower area, and wifi. The lobby is very quiet and inviting and I have sat and used my laptop there while my room was being cleaned. They have a nice little pool, and coffee is available all day from the breakfast room. There are restaurants, stores and fastfood restaurants in this
Manager Response: Dear SEG20 -  Thank you so much for taking the time to review us on TripAdvisor and for your continued patronage. It means the world to us that we are your "go to" hotel when visiting family in the area and that you find your visits so consistently comfortable. We are grateful for your recommendation and hope to welcome you back very soon.   Sincerely,   Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary: If the location works for you (access to the toll road is instant, the 5 isn't far), this is a fine property.  Nice rooms, good breakfast, walkable local shopping center, easy drive to plenty of typical OC restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear AZtucsontraveler -  It was wonderful having the chance to welcome you recently. Thank you so much for choosing us and for taking the time to share your experience with fellow travelers. It is fantastic to hear that the location and accommodations proved perfect for your needs. We hope you will consider us again the next time you are in the area.   Warm regards ,  Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary: My husband and I enjoyed our first stay at Ayres Suites hotel.  We were impressed by the look and cleanliness and great breakfast the hotel had to offer.  Stay were very friendly.  We would for sure stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Tammy -  Thank you so much for taking a chance on us and allowing us the opportunity to exceed your expectations. I am thrilled you found your stay so comfortable and the decor and complimentary amenities to your liking. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to recommend us and look forward to your next visit.   Safe travels,   Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary Heading: 5 Star accommodations at a 3 Star Price
Summary: This was my first visit to this hotel and the experience was superb. I arrived after a harrowing 16 hour journey from the east coast with only the chance to grab 4 hours of sleep before the next day's business since I arrived at 2:30 AM. The room was comfortable and the staff arranged for a van to take me to my meeting. The staff was extremely friendly and accommodating. Highly recommended.

We love staying at this hotel.  It's been four years since our last visit and it still looks fabulous.  We love the large shower/bath, breakfast, clean rooms, pool and most of all the friendly staff that's eager to please.

Since 2009 we have stayed at the Ayres a minimum of 4-3 times a year and each time has always been outstanding! From the lobby to the rooms, the property is upscale,beautiful,comfortable and quite. Staff is always friendly and knowledgeable. Breakfast is a true Hot breakfast! plus they even provide a complimentary happy hour. We travel quite a bit and we are always thrilled when we are in Mission Viejo or surrounding areas because we know we get to stay at the Ayres! Any negative reviews are definitely the exception and not the rule. Highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Mary -  Thank you so much for your very enthusiastic recommendation of our hotel and for your continued patronage. It means such a great deal to us that you find our accommodations and service so consistent and look forward to your many visits. A guest recommendation is truly the highest honor a hotel can achieve and we are very grateful for yours. Please return again very soon.   Sincerely,   Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary: It is a very convenient location.  The staff is friendly and accomodating.  There was a chip of glass on my bathroom floor that I almost stepped on from the previous guest no doubt.  That was a little concerning.  Also I felt the room had a very musty smell.  Some of it was from the bathroom, but much of it was from the air conditioning/heating vent.  THey do have a great breakfast service which is complimentary.  Though there were a couple of issues.  I would recommend this location for a stay and I would go back.  I have stayed here before and it is usually consistent, this time was a little under par.
Manager Response: Dear Redmontdc -  Thank you so much for allowing us the chance to welcome you again. While I am pleased you found your overall stay satisfying, I do apologize for any cleanliness or odor issues you may have experienced. We are so sorry that any hazard was found in your bathroom and are always happy to come and remove the item should we be informed. I have already ensured that your comments have been shared with the Housekeeping Team to avoid anything like this in the future. I do hope this has not soured you on our hotel and that we can look forward to welcoming you in the future.   Sincerely,   Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary: We have stayed at the Ayres Suites at least 10 times over the last few years.  It looks as good now as it did on our first visit. The staff is friendly, the location is great for anyone visiting Rancho Santa Margarita, Mission Viejo and the surrounding areas.  It sits very near the 241 tollroad.  It offers a full breakfast, microwave, refrigerator, iron and ironing board and is always in excellent shape.  We have never been disappointed.

This hotel is wonderful. It's reasonably priced with a great breakfast buffet. The rooms are spacious, clean and inviting. Most hotels charge extra for a refrigerator and microwave, and Ayres includes them in each of the rooms. I would recommend this hotel to anyone interested in a beautiful hotel with great ammenities as well as a very professional and cordial staff. I love this hotel and stay here while attending a yearly conference in the area.

Summary Heading: Breakfast and Dinner - What more could you ask for
Summary: I love the hotels that provide breakfast and dinner along with a reasonable room rate.  And to boot, free cocktails.  Love this place.  The staff was professional, rooms and common areas clean and well appointed.  This was my second trip here and I would definitely stay again.

Summary Heading: Ayers Hotel - Mission Viejo - Home Away From Home
Summary: This is a professionally run hotel who goes to great lengths to make you feel at home!  The staff is extremely friendly and a real joy with which to work.  Rooms are spacious well appointed and very clean.   The breakfasts and evening meals are fresh and very convenient.  I enjoyed my stay and recommend it highly!  Thanks!

We had a school group of students and adults stay and had a fabulous stay. The hotel is elegant, the rooms are very clean, the breakfast had a great variety and was delicious. The location was very convenient for us. The staff was accomodating to our special needs. We would definitely stay here again. Thank you!

We stayed at the Ayres Suites Mission Veijo for a total of four nights. I can't believe how wonderful of an experience it was. The staff were very friendy, and certyainly were there to please. The room was clean and very comfortable. I really enjoyed how eco-friendly they are. We visit this area abot once a year and this certainly will become our home base for the future....

For the past five years, we have been visiting our Grand daughter, two or three times a year and our visits usually last two or three weeks. On every one of these visits we have stayed at the Ayres Hotel in Mission Viejo. Everyone in the hotel from the top to the bottom is always extremely pleasant and helpful. We feel so comfortable, we would not think of staying anywhere else. Ii is our home away from home. We would strongly recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the ares.

Summary Heading: Friendly service and nice clean hotel
Summary: I booked the hotel directly through Ayres, and I had the pleasure of speaking with Jeff. He was extrmely informative and patient, as I asked him a million questions. I was not sure of how many rooms I would need, I had questions about the surrounding businesses, ie places to eat, things to do ...he was so patient and so kind. Secondly, I got lost off the freeway, I called the hotel and spoke Jeff again, and since I was lost, he showed me again how customer service was his number one goal, and once again he heled me more than any hotel representative ever has. As you can tell I really really love Jeff..he is truly awesome. I got to the hotel, checked in, I think Jeff took all of 3 seconds to check me in and handed me my room keys. The check in was so quick, that after a long

Summary Heading: Be careful they have excessive charges
Summary: We stayed there for the third time. We enjoyed the first two visits a year ago. The Hotel hallways smelled of mold. When we arrived workers staying in the downstairs back rooms were standing around in the hallway and outside were watching a fellow worker wash his car in the back. The Hotel hallways smelled of mold. Upon leaving my wife and I were blamed for damage to a chair we did not even sit in. We were charged an excessive cleaning charge. I would not recommend this hotel to anyone. It has no responsible management on duty at night.
Manager Response: Dear lwatson57 -  Thank you very much for allowing us to welcome you a second time and for your candid review of our hotel. I am truly sorry if your experience this time did not match up to the expectations set by previous visits. I have discussed the odor you described with the Housekeeping team and the issue has been resolved. As to the cleaning fee that was assessed, I do apologize for the misunderstanding and was more than happy to remove this fee once clarification was given , although I do understand the inconvenience and apologize for that as well. We had hoped based on your previous comments that you were happy with your stay and also hope you will give us another opportunity to show you how comfortable our hotel really is. Thank you again for your review.   Sincerely,   Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary: If you are looking for the best hotel to stay in while visiting the Orange County area, be sure to stay at the Ayres.  We visit Orange County weekly, and will only stay at the Ayres Mission Viejo.  It has a very luxurious feel throughout the hotel and is beautifully decorated in rich, comforting colors & design.  The rooms are spacious and luxurious & very, very, clean!!!  The staff is very professional, kind, have "at-your-service" attitudes and make you feel welcomed every time you stay there.  The breakfast is NOT you average little breakfast bar.   They serve a full breakfast, eggs, bacon, sausage, hashbrowns, oatmeal, cereal, bagels, juices, coffee, tea & fresh fruit.  And the best part, the breakfast comes with the price of the room.  In the evening, they have a

This was my first stay at a Ayres Suites hotel, and I can say I was very pleased.  Upon arrival in the parking lot, the outside of the hotel had the feel of a large mansion and not a hotel.  The lobby was well decorated, and the hotel staff were eager to assist us checking in.    The room was spacious and had a nice leather couch.  Breakfast the next morning was also great.  Upon checkout, I learned that they will cook-to-order if you ask!  Next, I'll request a custom omelet.

We stayed for one night at Ayres Mission Viejo because we previously had an excellent stay there. The view from our room was nice with a lake to the right and the shopping center below us. We could see the toll road, but we could hear no noise. The chocolate chip cookies available on the reception desk from 5 pm, were as delicious as before. The canteen area served free wine, beer, and juice with salad and a Mexican meal.  In the same area, the breakfast (closing at 9 am) was very good with made to order eggs, cereals, fruit, and waffles.  Everything in the room worked, including the free wi-fi, and there was a complete set of toiletries.  The staff are more than friendly and helpful, and the decorations in the room and public spaces are among the best and most sophisticated you

Summary Heading: Ayres was so accommodating for our wedding guests!
Summary: I actually couldn't wait to write this review!  My son got married March 2nd in Rancho Santa Margarita and when we committed to the date a year prior, the venue suggested Ayres Suites Mission Viejo.  Before reserving a block of rooms for the wedding, we visited Ayres and met with the event manager, Jeanette. Being that my daughter in law is European, she immediately liked the European decor at Ayres and the rooms were conveniently equipped with a mini refrigerator, small sink and a microwave which comes in handy for these type of events.  (The rooms were spacious and had a little table, and in the cases of King studio - they had a couch). Ayres was very reasonably priced and the rate included breakfast.   The periodic reservation process was easy and we immediately received

Summary Heading: Ayres Suites - Mission Viejo is a business traveler's dream!
Summary: I have had the pleasure of staying at the Ayres Suites in Mission Viejo on trips to Southern California for the past 5 years and everything about the stay remains impeccable! The staff is professional, friendly, knowledgeable and helpful. The rooms are always immaculate! The surroundings help you relax and feel safe and comfortable. A real breakfast is served daily and the snacks and wine/beer are great at the end of a long day. I have met wonderful fellow business travelers and it is great to see many again and again over the years. One thing that we have all agreed on is the superior service, surroundings and value of Ayres suites. The new building is also excellent. The restaurant is also top notch. If you want to venture out; there are literally dozens of restaurants nearby
Manager Response: Dear JE -  Thank you so very much for your kind words and for making us your choice of hotel in the area. We are always thrilled to learn we have provided such consistent service and accommodations to our guests. It makes us incredibly happy to welcome you back year after year. I appreciate your comments about our sister hotel as well and will be sure to pass them along.  We are very grateful for your patronage and look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Warm regards,   Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary Heading: Stay At Ayres Suites Mission Viejo
Summary: I  stay here at Mission Viejo all the time and quite frequently.  We love this place.  The staff is so accomodating and we have come to know Jeff at the front desk now and he has always been so courteous, professional and meets all our requests and needs. When my Mom passed away I had all my out of state family stay there and they helped me out tremendously during such a hardship and difficult time. I use them for all my needs and over night events.  All of the staff are welcoming and make you feel special and not like just another assembly line of people coming in.  I highly recommend this hotel. What you get for the money is very competitive. Full Breakfast and full dinner Mon-Fri.  I believe plus Happy hour of beer and wine. You cannot beat it.  Candy Feliz

We always stay at this hotel when we are in the area. The staff is so helpful and courteous. The rooms are clean. The hotel is decorated nicely, as well. I would recommend the Ayres Hotels to my family and friends. We have been staying at this hotel for approximately seven years.

The lobby is nice and love their breakfasts if you can ever wake up early enough for it. The rooms are good. The noise from the hallways echos into the rooms and you can hear the slamming of all the doors as people wake up and including service doors. You can keep the air on but it keeps turning off and on abruptly making it irritating when sleeping. Free Wi-Fi. Coffee and Juice available through out the day. Good for business but not catered well for those on vacation.

Summary Heading: Always a Favorite Place to Stay
Summary: We love the Ayres Suites Mission Viejo and have stayed there several times. The rooms are lovely with a mini-kitchen and plenty of room. They have the best breakfast every morning, During weekday evenings, they have a reception with free drinks and a light dinner, which is great if you are busy or working at the hotel and don't want to go out to eat.  Staff is always wonderful. And don't forget the gorgeous sunset views every night.

Stayed for a quick weekend get-away.  Very peaceful experience.  Excellent Customer Service !  Jeff at the front desk fantastic.  Enjoyed the Breakfast.   I would recomend the Ayres Hotels to all of my friends and Family.  Great value.

I frequent this hotel for business and am never disappointed.  Charming and big rooms, great showers, appreciate the mini-kitchen, great breakfast.  I love the warm feelings of home when I stay from the staff and management.  Will always go back when in this area.

Nothing but good things to say about the Ayres Suites. Huge room, great shower, mini kitchen, good breakfast, great bed. All good. Loved it and will definitely go back. Can't think of anything to complain about.
Manager Response: Dear jokouracos -  Thank you so much for your positive review of our hotel and for allowing us to host your stay. We are always thrilled to know we have provided an exceptional guest experience. We are grateful for your recommendation and hope to welcome you again very soon.   Warm regards,   Dean Birtles  General Manager

Summary Heading: Extremely helpful and friendly staff, good facilities definitley will return.
Summary: Always great reception from very friendly staff. A good indicator is staff continuity over a period of time, always the same smiling faces.  Good facilities and well located.  The rooms are always very clean and well furnished.
Manager Response: Dear dcw754 -  Thank you for your concise review of our hotel. It is always encouraging to read that a guest finds his/her stays so consistently comfortable and the service up to par. We are always pleased to welcome you to our hotel and look forward to the next visit.   Safe travels,   Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary: Highly recommend.The accommodations and the staff were first-rate. The daily morning breakfast was outstanding and the service was unsurpassed. From the minute we walked into the lobby, until the day we departed, we were treated like family.
Manager Response: Dear Luke S -  Thank you so much for your enthusiastic recommendation of our hotel. It means a great deal to us that you find your visits so exceptional and that we are able to make you feel comfortable and welcome. We appreciate you taking the time to inform fellow travelers about our hotel and hope to welcome you again in the near future.   Warm regards,   Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary Heading: great hotel especially for the money
Summary: This is a great local hotel to stay in near Mission Viejo.  I am a Marriott and Hilton gold member, but I prefer to stay here for its large rooms, free breakfast, and great service and hospitality.  we stayed over the Christmas holidays and also through New Years.
Manager Response: Dear ras02 -  And we are thrilled to be your preference! Thank you so much for making us your choice of hotel when in the area. I am so pleased our spacious rooms and warm service keep bringing you back and that we are able to exceed the expectations set by the large brands you mentioned. We hope you will have the chance to visit again very soon.  Many thanks,   Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary: This is a comfortable, clean, consistently pleasant experience.  We stay every year around the holidays and have a great time.  The free hot breakfast is delicious and the staff is helpful and friendly.

Summary Heading: One of the best hotels in the area with FULL Breakfast
Summary: We arrived for Xmas and stayed at this lovely hotel which has the most helpful and friendly staff, nice size rooms with big comforters on the beds and best of all when you wake up there is a full breakfast waiting for you downstairs (eggs, bacons, pancakes, oatmeal, etc).   This is a lovely hotel on a hillside and further away from the freeway (about 10 miles) but worth the extra 15 minute drive to be in a serene, peaceful and beautiful setting at a really comfortable and cozy area of Mission Viejo.    Another plus...at the bottom of the hill (that the hotel sits on) there is a grocery store and small stores and places to eat which are easy to walk to (or drive). We forgot shaving cream and wanted to take flowers with us and did some quick shopping at the nearby stores.   We

I came down to visit relatives in the area, the lobby was decorated incredibly and the staff was more than outstanding, the room was comforable and well appointed; the wall heating unit was a challenge as it was located next to the bed and either made the area of the room to hot or to cool  in that area move the bed and exchange it with the sofa. The Italian restruant ( can not spell it) advertised in the room refused to serve me as I was by my self a big disapointment. Breakfast was great made for a merry christymas morning. Frank G

Dont stay in the 'old' wing.  It's dirty, not kept up well and smells.  The comforter was dirty, there was hair in the bathtub (not mine) and there were 'spots' of liquid arround the base of the toilet.  The floor smelled like it used to be a smoking section and it smelled like poorly shampooed carpets...kind of a wet dog smell.  Ick.
Manager Response: Dear Got_root -  Thank you so much for your candid review of our hotel. I greatly apologize that your experience with us was anything less than exceptional. What you describe is unacceptable as cleanliness is of utmost importance to us. We are always more than happy to move a guest should he or she experience what you describe, and I am sorry if this option was not available in your case. And while we have never been a smoking hotel, there is the possibility that a guest was smoking inside the guestroom. If you would be kind enough to contact me directly with your room number, I will look into this immediately. As to the cleanliness issues discussed, rest assured these have reviewed at length with the Housekeeping Team to ensure no guest experiences this in the future. Again, I apologize for the situation and do hope you will give us a second opportunity to show you how remarkable a stay with us can be.   Sincerely,   Dean Birtles General Manager

Summary: I was there for a seminar. For the price it was a very good deal. They do a lot to make you think it is upscale. It is actually a dressed up Best Western in my opinion. You have to put your card in the wall to make your cool and heat work. So do not expect your room to be comfortable when you arrive. There are two hotels I was dropped of at the Spa one...I was told to drag my luggage to the other hotel across the property. When I asked to use the luggage rack the front desk guy said ...well OK but it is this buildings cart. I said "aren't you both owned by AYRES?" Manager Response: Dear Donna -  Thank you so much for your review of our hotel.
